short_summary: Passenger Vessel for Hire by Conservation and Protection for Patrols in waters adjacent to western Cape Breton N.S.
description: The Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO) has a requirement to hire a fishing vessel between 40 to 44 feet in overall length, with the service of a Captain and two crewmembers. The requirement is detailed in the attached tender notice and support documents.
